alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Gaines (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 6:58PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gaines and northwestern Dawson Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 658 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Welch, or 15 miles east of Seagraves, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Welch, Loop and Punkin Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
